data.name: XForbiddenCharacters
desc: provides access to forbidden character settings in a document.
In some languages, particular characters are not allowed to be placed at the beginning or at the end of a text line.

methods.name: getForbiddenCharacters
desc: returns the forbidden characters for a given locale.

methods.name: hasForbiddenCharacters
desc: determines if forbidden characters are set for a given locale.

methods.name: removeForbiddenCharacters
desc: removes the setting of forbidden characters for a given locale.

methods.name: setForbiddenCharacters
desc: sets the forbidden characters for a given Locale.
